issue.title: [Java] Upgrade Netty and gRPC dependencies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14198](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14198). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current versions in use are quite old and subject to vulnerabilities.

See https://www.cvedetails.com/cve/CVE-2021-21409/
